tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE activity_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  query_text TEXT,
  query_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE database_activity_logs (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR,
  query_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    log_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ActivityLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    query TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE SuspiciousActivities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    query TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE DetectedActivities (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE AnalyzedLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    query TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    analysis_result VARCHAR(50)
)
